## validateVendorParts() function

Validates the vendor section of a schema string contains allowed wildcard values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function validateVendorParts(parts: Array<string>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parts | Array&lt;string&gt; | Array of parts from a schema string |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether the vendor validation parts are a valid combination
